Title: Relates to the termination of leases when a domestic violence victim obtains an order of protection or signed affidavit
Summary: Relates to the termination of leases when a domestic violence victim obtains an order of protection or signed affidavit.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to the termination of leases when a domestic violence victim obtains an order of protection or signed affidavit
